name: Ultimate Fluffy
description:
Story

This is the extraordinary adventure of Remy, a brave and fearless wooden toy.  He will go on an adventurous journey to save his beloved Holly, a rag doll wounded by the cute but cruel family cat, Fluffy. During his journey Remy will face numerous and dangerous hardships to recover the objects necessary to save Holly: needle, thread and cloth. Help Remy in his special adventure!

Game Structure

The video game is a 3D third-person single player game. It features action and adventure elements and it is set in a family house. To navigate the game world the player controls a wooden toy called Remy. During each level Remy will get an item which can be used in the next level. Depending on the level where he is located, the player will have to deal with different obstacles and enemies: avoid sharp knives and burning stoves, fight against violent toy soldiers and play a thrilling flight race. NPCs can also be encountered during the game. By iteracting with them the player will get necessary information to continue the story. The house, where the game is set, is made up of 4 rooms, each unique in its setting.

Controls General:
  • WASD/Arrow Keys: Movement 
  • Shift: Running 
  • Mouse: Camera
  • Spacebar: Jump
Attack: 
  • T: Grab Needle
  • Left Click: Attack
Fly:
  • F: Grab Hang Glider
  • WASD/Arrow keys: Direction
  • Shift: Move Forwards 
  • Z: Turbo
